ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We would like to thank the Iranian team who assisted us during the field sampling: Roozbeh Behrooz, Masoud Nazarizadeh, Atefeh Asadi, Amin Salmanian, Alireza Mohammadi, Kamran Almasieh, Mohammadreza Masoud, Saeid Khaki, Farokh Rastkar,Â and Jalil Imani Harsini. Our thank also goes to the game guards of the Department of Environment of Iran for their logistic help. Special thank goes to Philippe Geniez and Mehdi Rajabizadeh for both scientific support and for provisioning of a number of species occurrences.
